description: Describes the count or amount of an item

allocated.description: This represents the exact quantity allocated for purchase of the item.

available.description: This represents the exact quantity available for purchase of the item. The buyer can only purchase multiples of this

maximum.description: This represents the maximum quantity allowed for purchase of the item

minimum.description: This represents the minimum quantity allowed for purchase of the item

selected.description: This represents the quantity selected for purchase of the item

unitized.description: This represents the quantity available in a single unit of the item
